p: The estimation of total phenolics contained in V. officinalis extracts was carried out using spectrophotometric analysis with Folin–Ciocalteu phenol reagent. As shown in Table 3, the total phenolic content varied from 126.55 ± 0.78 mg GAE/g extract ( Vo-C) to 189.91 ± 2.93 mg GAE/g extract ( Vo-S) and it decreased in the order: Vo- S > Vo-STB > Vo-in vivo > Vo-C.
